channel.title: Welcome to Forum of Lies! - Forum Hub
channel.description:
![Throne of Lies Banner|900x275](https://i.imgur.com/cdLeUII.png)
Welcome to Forum of Lies! This thread contains important links to help you navigate the forums.
---- #
Rules and Moderation :shield:
[**Global Rules**](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/global-forum-discord-game-meta-rules-please-read-first/244) [**Forum Game Rules**](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/official-forum-mafia-and-forum-of-lies-rules/78926) [**Terms of Service + Privacy Policy + GDPR**](https://toli.es/legal) [Public Moderation Logs](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/public-moderation-logs/82218) [List of Forum Staff/Volunteers](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/list-of-forum-staff-volunteers-ordered-alphabetically/81361) ---- #
Forum Games :male_detective:
## Hosting FM [Hosting Guide](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/updated-official-hosting-guide/83521) [Queue Thread](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/fm-queue-queues-and-submit-thread/79675) [Alternate Account Applications](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/alternate-account-applications-beta/82086) ## Playing FM [Guide to Using Discourse](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/guide-using-discourse/83609) [Guide to Using Discourse for FM](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/guide-using-discourse-for-forum-mafia/83610) ## FoL Information [FoL Class Cards](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/new-forum-of-lies-classcards-now-officially-official/87793) [FoL Hosting Feedback List](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/forum-of-lies-hosting-feedback-list/75082) ---- #
The Community :speech_balloon:
## Useful Links [Throne of Lies Steam Store Page](https://store.steampowered.com/app/595280/Throne_of_Lies_Medieval_Politics/) [Throne of Lies Official Site](https://www.throneoflies.com/) [Throne of Lies Discord](http://discord.gg/tol) [Throne of Lies Wiki](https://tol.fandom.com/wiki/Throne_of_Lies:_The_Online_Game_of_Lies_and_Deceit_Wikia) [Throne of Lies Subreddit](https://www.reddit.com/r/ThroneOfLiesGame/) [Thronepass Patreon Perks](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/new-thronepass-patreon-community-perks-forum-name-colors-titles-flairs/76833?u=chloe) ## Common Discussion Threads [Queue Discussion Thread](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/queue-status-site-fm-fol-state-of-things-discussion-thread-discuss-stuff-here-instead-of-in-the-queue-thread-going-forward/82430) [FoL Feedback Thread](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/fol-feedback-thread/36636) [Big Thread of Birthdays](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/big-thread-of-birthdays/45506) [FoL Awards - Nomination Thread](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/fol-awards-2021-nominations-thread/87187) [FoL Awards - Discussion Thread](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/discussion-introducing-the-forum-of-lies-awards/87059) [List of Completed FM Games - 2020](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/list-of-completed-fm-games-2020/87205?u=chloe) [List of Completed FM Games - 2021](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/fol-games-2021-list-thread/87188)
